item.title: Animating a double pendulum
item.description: Physics of double pendulums Simulating a double pendulum involves solving its equations of motion, which are derived from Lagrangian mechanics.

item.title: Paradoxes and Limits
item.description: Mathematics is full of puzzles that appear contradictory at first sight. Often, the resolution comes from taking a closer look at how limits work.

item.title: How to setup a blog for free
item.description: Introduction This is how I set up this Blog, free of charge. All you need is a markdown editor, in my case Obsidian, and a Github account.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: My Intentions During my Studies at University, at my Job as a Programmer, or during personal projects, I often come across topics / problems / solutions worth sharing.

item.title: Home
item.description: Welcome to my Blog. This is very much WIP.
